'''Alpha v1.0.15'''<ref>https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RGGtiQsnYUQ</ref> is a version of [[Java Edition Alpha]] released on August 3, 2010<ref>[[wordofnotch:899313517|"Minecraft Alpha 1.0.14"]] – [[The Word of Notch]], August 3, 2010</ref>. It introduced Survival [[multiplayer]] servers.

The server version [[Alpha server 0.1.0|0.1.0]] was not released at the same time,<ref>[[wordofnotch:899291046|"SMP server release tomorrow, here's what'll be in"]] – [[The Word of Notch]], August 3, 2010</ref> but instead was released one day later, on August 4, 2010.<ref>[[wordofnotch:902190310|"Minecraft Alpha Server 0.1.0"]] - [[The Word of Notch]], August 4, 2010</ref>

== Additions ==
=== Gameplay ===
'''[[Commands]]'''
* {{cmd|wood}}
** Drops 4 [[saplings]].
* {{cmd|iron}}
** Drops 4 [[iron ingots]].

== Changes ==
=== Blocks ===
'''[[File:Lava JE11.gif|32px]] [[Lava]]'''
* Sets blocks on [[fire]].

=== Items ===
'''General'''
* Changed the appearance of [[item]]s from the [[third person]] once again.

=== General ===
'''[[Animation]]s'''
* Arm-swinging animation added, viewable in multiplayer and in third person view.

'''[[Multiplayer]]'''
* Players can now enter the IP for a server other than Mojang's official server.

'''[[Title screen]]'''
* Fixed the "M" in the ''Minecraft'' title screen logo, changing from [[File:Java Edition logo 4.png|x20px]] back to [[File:Java Edition logo 5.png|x20px]].

== Fixes ==
'''2 bugs fixed'''
* The player can no longer move while on the inventory screen.
* The player can no longer place blocks in the same space with entities if it is covered with snow.

== Trivia ==
* The corresponding blog post is labeled as "Minecraft Alpha v1.0.14", which is a duplicate of a [[Alpha v1.0.14|previous version]] released four days earlier, on July 30.<ref>{{link|url=https://www.minecraftforum.net/forums/archive/alpha/alpha-survival-single-player/800775-alpha-1-0-15|title=Alpha 1.0.15?|author=Darerd11|website=Minecraft Forum|date=August 3, 2010}}</ref> The date of the jar and the timestamp of the post clearly show that it is Alpha v1.0.15 instead.
